HOME.lema: Turning problems into code, and code into innovation

EDUCATION.title: Education
EDUCATION.t1: Currently, I am studying System Analyst at the ISET Institute in Mar del Plata.
EDUCATION.t2: As for programming itself, although I have participated in courses, most of my knowledge comes from constant practice and reading other people's code. I have learned by breaking things, rebuilding them, and always seeking new challenges.
